sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { Button,Row,Col,ListGroup,Card, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {getOrderDetails} from '../actions/orderActions' const OrderScreen = ({ match }) => { // console.log("match.parmas",match.params) const orderId = window.location.href.split('/')[4] const dispatch = useDispatch() const addDecimals = (num) =>{ return (Math.round(num*100)/100).toFixed(2) } order.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price*item.qty,0) const orderDetails = useSelector(state =>state.orderDetails) const {error,loading,order} = orderDetails useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) // eslint-disable-next-line },[]) return ( loading ? :error ? {error} :<>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? (Order is empty) : ( {order.orderItems.map((item,index)=>( {item.name} {item.qty}*${item.price} = ${item.qty*item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} ) } export default OrderScreen
